ValidationRule.description: This validation rule ensures that the Expected_End_Date__c, pse__Region__c, and pse__Group__c fields are populated when the Engagement_Type__c is not equal to "BVS Engagement". This is to ensure that all necessary information is provided for non-BVS Projs
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Engagement_Type__c, "BVS Engagement")), OR( ISBLANK(Expected_End_Date__c), ISBLANK(pse__Region__c), ISBLANK(pse__Group__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Expected End Date, Region, and Group are required for the selected Engagement Type. Please ensure all these fields are filled in.
